projects.title: nobhad.codes
projects.description: A custom-built portfolio designed to showcase technical projects and professional expertise. Prioritizes performance, accessibility, and clean design over flashy gimmicks—demonstrating the same principles applied to client work. Design inspired by a mischievous coyote cartoon character.
projects.challenge: Most portfolio templates feel generic and fail to demonstrate actual development skills. I needed a site that would stand out while proving I could build production-ready applications—not just pretty mockups.
projects.approach: Built everything from scratch using vanilla TypeScript instead of React to demonstrate fundamental skills. Implemented a custom SPA router, GSAP-powered animations, and a full Express backend. The playful design draws inspiration from a mischievous coyote cartoon character—clever, resourceful, and a little unconventional. The interactive business card serves as both a memorable introduction and a showcase of animation capabilities.
results: Sub-2-second load times with optimized asset delivery
Seamless page transitions without framework overhead
Integrated client portal and admin dashboard
keyFeatures: Interactive 3D business card with flip animation
CRT TV hover preview for project cards
Dark/light theme with system preference detection

projects.title: The Backend
projects.description: A full-stack dashboard and client portal for managing freelance projects. The developer side handles leads, project tracking, client invitations via magic links, messaging, file sharing, and invoice generation. The client side gives clients real-time project progress, file uploads, messaging, and invoice history—all without third-party platforms.
projects.challenge: Managing freelance projects meant juggling emails, spreadsheets, Dropbox, and invoicing apps. Clients had no visibility into project progress, and context was constantly lost across disconnected tools. I needed a unified system that would professionalize the client experience while streamlining my workflow.
projects.approach: Designed a dual-portal architecture: an admin dashboard for project management and a client portal for transparency. Built secure authentication with magic link invitations, real-time messaging, automated PDF invoice generation, and a visual Kanban board. Used SQLite for simplicity and portability, with a migration system for schema evolution.
results: Clients can self-serve project status, files, and invoices
Automated invoice generation saves hours per month
Complete audit trail of all client communications
keyFeatures: Magic link client invitations (no password setup required)
PDF invoice generation with line items

projects.title: Recycle Content
projects.description: A tool for content creators and the agencies that manage them. Recycle content to subscribers who haven't purchased yet using SKU management and automatic buyer exclusion lists. Features a browser extension for data capture and multi-tenant architecture for agency-level operations.
projects.challenge: Content creators on subscription platforms struggle to maximize revenue from their back catalog. Manually tracking which subscribers have purchased which content is tedious and error-prone, leading to missed sales opportunities or awkward duplicate offers.
projects.approach: Building a SaaS platform with browser extension integration to automatically capture purchase data. The system tracks SKUs, maintains buyer exclusion lists, and enables targeted re-marketing to subscribers who haven't purchased specific content. Multi-tenant architecture supports agencies managing multiple creators.
keyFeatures: Chrome extension for automatic data capture

projects.title: Linktrees
projects.description: Custom-designed link-in-bio pages for social media profiles. Features animated backgrounds, theme customization, and analytics integration.
projects.challenge: Standard Linktree pages look generic and don't reflect personal brand. Creators wanted unique link-in-bio pages that stood out from the sea of identical templates while remaining mobile-friendly and fast-loading.
projects.approach: Designed custom themed pages with GSAP-powered animated backgrounds. Each page is hand-crafted with unique color schemes, typography, and micro-interactions. Kept the codebase lightweight (no frameworks) for optimal mobile performance.
results: Positive client feedback on unique designs
